price: Kuma waɗannan da suke gaugãwa a cikin kãfirci kada su ɓãta maka rai. Lalle ne su, bã zã su cũci Allah da kõme ba. Allah yanã nufin cẽwa, bã zai sanya musu wani rabo ba a cikin Lãhira kuma suna da wata azãba mai girma.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡكُفۡرِۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَلَّا يَجۡعَلَ لَهُمۡ حَظّٗا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥzunka alladhīna yusāriʿūna fī al-kuf'ri innahum lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan yurīdu al-lahu allā yajʿala lahum ḥaẓẓan fī al-ākhirati walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
